VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverwood Forest relative to Shadowfen?
SRP.A: Silverwood Forest is {above} Shadowfen in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverwood Forest}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Veridian Plains}.

VE.Q: What is Veridian Plains's Construction Starts in 2010?
VE.A: Veridian Plains's construction starts in 2010 is {160.27} units/year.

VE.Q: What is Silverwood Forest's Construction Starts in 2014?
VE.A: Silverwood Forest's construction starts in 2014 is {2103.65} units/year.

VE.Q: What is Silverwood Forest's Construction Starts in 2015?
VE.A: Silverwood Forest's construction starts in 2015 is {2279.65} units/year.

VE.Q: What are the construction starts of Shadowfen, Sunstone Desert, and Veridian Plains in 2004?
VE.A: Shadowfen's construction starts is {503.75} units/year, Sunstone Desert's construction starts is {619.74} units/year, Veridian Plains's construction starts is {306.19} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Construction Starts in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum construction starts is {42.33} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Construction Starts in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum construction starts is {4077.42} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Construction Starts level recorded for Shadowfen?
What is the lowest Construction Starts level recorded for Shadowfen?
EVJ.A: Shadowfen's lowest recorded level is approximately {376.40} units/year in {2003}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Construction Starts?
SC.A: The average total construction starts is {3202.70} units/year.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Construction Starts exceed 3702.15 units/year? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Construction Starts fall between 2912.27 and 3218.83 units/year? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Construction Starts go below 2428.95 units/year? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2013, did the total Construction Starts experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total construction starts between 2007 and 2013 was {smaller} than between 2006 and 2016.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 2015 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 2015 was {lower} than in 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2008, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 1999 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 2000 and 2008 was {higher} than between 1999 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2016, did the total Construction Starts experience a larger or smaller change than between 2011 and 2017?
NC.A: The change in total construction starts between 2000 and 2016 was {larger} than between 2011 and 2017.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Silverwood Forest} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Veridian Plains, Shadowfen, Sunstone Desert, Silverwood Forest}.
